body_html:
I have identified the source of the issue.
For the record: the GPU version of TF does not perform bound checking. When I run the code on CPU I immediately noticed that I had an out of bounds access in the embedding layer. If you experience similar results it might be worth to run it on CPU to check for this type of error.

I have identified the source of the issue.
For the record: the GPU version of TF does not perform bound checking. When I run the code on CPU I immediately noticed that I had an out of bounds access in the embedding layer. If you experience similar results it might be worth to run it on CPU to check for this type of error.
body:
I have identified the source of the issue. 
For the record: the GPU version of TF does not perform bound checking. When I run the code on CPU I immediately noticed that I had an out of bounds access in the embedding layer. If you experience similar results it might be worth to run it on CPU to check for this type of error.
